trans-unit.id: We are about to generate your very own passphrase
trans-unit.source: We're about to generate your very own passphrase
trans-unit.target: Vamos a generar tu propia frase de contraseña

trans-unit.id: This keeps your account secure, and lets you open your wallet on multiple devices.
trans-unit.source: This keeps your account secure, and lets you open your wallet on multiple devices.
trans-unit.target: Esto mantiene tu cuenta segura y te permite abrir el monedero en varios dispositivos.

trans-unit.id: It is very important you write this down.
trans-unit.source: It's very important you write this down.
trans-unit.target: Es muy importante que la conserves escrita.

trans-unit.id: Your passphrase will not be shown again.
trans-unit.source: Your passphrase will not be shown again.
trans-unit.target: Tu frase de contraseña no se mostrará de nuevo.

trans-unit.id: Without it you will lose access to your wallet.
trans-unit.source: Without it you will lose access to your wallet.
trans-unit.target: Si ella, ya no podrás tener acceso a tu monedero.

trans-unit.id: I have written down or otherwise securely stored my passphrase
trans-unit.source: I have written down or otherwise securely stored my passphrase
trans-unit.target: He escrito o de cualquier otra forma guardado de manera segura mi frase de contraseña

trans-unit.id: Set a PIN for quick access
trans-unit.source: Set a PIN for quick access
trans-unit.target: Define un PIN para acceso rápido
Revisa de nuevo la frase de contraseña
El PIN debe ser un número de 4 dígitos
Esto puede tomar algo de tiempo,

trans-unit.id: Request timeout. Please check your internet connection.
trans-unit.source: Request timeout. Please check your internet connection.
trans-unit.target: Se agotó el tiempo de espera de la solicitud. Comprueba tu conexión a Internet.
No se pudo guardar tu información

trans-unit.id: We could not connect you to Mecto, please check your internet connection.
trans-unit.source: We couldn't connect you to Mecto, please check your internet connection.
trans-unit.target: No pudimos conectarte con Mecto, comprueba tu conexión a Internet.

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid address to send to
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid address to send to
trans-unit.target: Introduce una dirección de destino válida

trans-unit.id: Some funds are temporarily unavailable. To send this transaction, you will need to wait for your pending transactions to be confirmed first.
trans-unit.source: Some funds are temporarily unavailable. To send this transaction, you'll need to wait for your pending transactions to be confirmed first.
trans-unit.target: Algunos fondos no están disponibles temporalmente. Para enviar esta transacción, primero debes esperar a que tus transacciones pendientes se hayan confirmado.

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is. We have amended the value in the amount field for you
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
trans-unit.target: Parece que estás intentando desocupar tu monedero. Tomando en cuenta la tarifa por la transacción, calculamos que el importe máximo que puedes enviar es %(sendableBalance)s. Hemos corregido por ti el valor en el campo del importe.

trans-unit.id: You do not have enough funds in your wallet (incl. fee)
trans-unit.source: You don't have enough funds in your wallet (incl. fee)
trans-unit.target: No tienes suficientes fondos en el monedero (incluida la tarifa)

trans-unit.id: A name is required to set your profile on Coin
trans-unit.source: A name is required to set your profile on Coin
trans-unit.target: Para configurar tu perfil en Coin se necesita un nombre

trans-unit.id: Your browser does not support geolocation
trans-unit.source: Your browser does not support geolocation
trans-unit.target: Tu navegador no es compatible con geolocalización
No se pudo obtener tu ubicación

trans-unit.id: Without a name, the payer would not be able to identify you on Mecto.
trans-unit.source: Without a name, the payer wouldn't be able to identify you on Mecto.
trans-unit.target: Sin un nombre, el pagador no podrá identificarte en Mecto.

trans-unit.id: Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is a service that lets you re-use the same avatar across websites and apps by specifying an email address.
trans-unit.source: Gravatar (globally recognised avatar) is a service that lets you re-use the same avatar across websites and apps by specifying an email address.
trans-unit.target: Gravatar (avatar reconocido a nivel mundial) es un servicio que te permite reutilizar el mismo avatar en varios sitios web y apps especificando una dirección de correo electrónico.

trans-unit.id: Mecto lets you broadcast your wallet address to other nearby Coin users by comparing GPS data. This data is deleted once you turn Mecto off.
trans-unit.source: Mecto lets you broadcast your wallet address to other nearby Coin users by comparing GPS data. This data is deleted once you turn Mecto off.
trans-unit.target: Mecto te permite difundir tu dirección de monedero a usuarios de Coin cercanos comparando datos GPS. Estos datos se eliminan una vez que desactivas Mecto.

trans-unit.id: Before you start using Mecto, you need to enter a name that will help others identify you.
trans-unit.source: Before you start using Mecto, you need to enter a name that will help others identify you.
trans-unit.target: Antes de comenzar a usar Mecto, debes introducir un nombre que permita que las demás personas te identifiquen.

trans-unit.id: You do not have any transactions yet
trans-unit.source: You don't have any transactions yet

trans-unit.target: No se encontraron usuarios de Coin cercanos

trans-unit.id: Searching your area for other Coin users
trans-unit.source: Searching your area for other Coin users
trans-unit.target: Buscando otros usuarios de Coin en tu área

trans-unit.id: Your transaction will appear in your history tab shortly.
trans-unit.source: Your transaction will appear in your history tab shortly.
trans-unit.target: En breve se mostrará la transacción en la pestaña Histórico.

trans-unit.id: Sorry, Coin Wallet did not load.
trans-unit.target: Lo sentimos, Coin Wallet no cargó.

trans-unit.id: Try updating your browser, or switching out of private browsing mode. If all else fails, download Chrome for your device.
trans-unit.source: Try updating your browser, or switching out of private browsing mode. If all else fails, download Chrome for your device.
trans-unit.target: Intenta actualizar el navegador o salir del modo de navegación privada. Si todo lo demás falla, descarga Chrome en el dispositivo.
El nombre de usuario no está disponible

trans-unit.id: I Agree To The Terms & Conditions
trans-unit.source: I Agree To The Terms & Conditions

trans-unit.id: Send up to :depositMax :depositSymbol to deposit address. It will be converted into :toSymbol, and sent to :toAddress
trans-unit.source: Send up to %(depositMax)s %(depositSymbol)s to deposit address. It will be converted into %(toSymbol)s, and sent to %(toAddress)s
trans-unit.target: Enviar hasta %(depositMax)s %(depositSymbol)s a la dirección para depositar. Esto se convertirá en %(toSymbol)s y se enviará a %(toAddress)s

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid return address
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid return address
trans-unit.target: Escribe una dirección de correo electrónico de remite correcta

trans-unit.id: Return address should be an address controlled by you where deposit will be returned in the event of a failed transaction.
trans-unit.source: Return address should be an address controlled by you where deposit will be returned in the event of a failed transaction.
trans-unit.target: La dirección de remite debe ser una dirección que tu controles, a donde se regresará el depósito en caso de que falle la transacción.
La cuenta ha sido eliminada correctamente

trans-unit.id: This page will be reloaded shortly.
trans-unit.source: This page will be reloaded shortly.
trans-unit.target: Esta página se cargará de nuevo en breve.

trans-unit.id: This will transfer all coins from the paper wallet address to your wallet.
trans-unit.source: This will transfer all coins from the paper wallet address to your wallet.
trans-unit.target: Esto transferirá todas las monedas de la dirección del monedero de papel a tu monedero.

trans-unit.id: This private key has no coins for transfer.
trans-unit.source: This private key has no coins for transfer.
trans-unit.target: Esta clave privada no tiene monedas para transferir.

trans-unit.id: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
trans-unit.source: Your private keys are keys to your funds so DO NOT SHARE them with anyone unless you'd like them to have access to your funds.
trans-unit.target: Tus claves privadas son las llaves de tus fondos, por esto, NO LAS COMPARTAS con nadie a menos que desees que tengan acceso a tus fondos.

trans-unit.id: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
trans-unit.source: Your wallet has no private keys with coins for export.
trans-unit.target: Tu monedero no tiene claves privadas con monedas para exportar.

trans-unit.id: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster. Sending ETH is equal 21000. Sending Tokens is equal around 200000.
trans-unit.source: Gas limit is the amount of gas to send with your transaction. Increasing this number will not get your transaction confirmed faster. Sending ETH is equal 21000. Sending Tokens is equal around 200000.
trans-unit.target: El límite de Gas es la cantidad de Gas para enviar con tu transacción. Aumentar este número no hará que tu transacción se confirme más rápido. Enviar ETH es igual a 21000. Enviar tokens en igual a aproximadamente 200000.

trans-unit.id: Please enter Gas Limit greater than zero
trans-unit.source: Please enter Gas Limit greater than zero
trans-unit.target: Introduce un límite de Gas mayor a cero

trans-unit.id: You do not have enough Ethereum funds to pay transaction fee (:ethereumRequired ETH).
trans-unit.source: You do not have enough Ethereum funds to pay transaction fee (%(ethereumRequired)s ETH).
trans-unit.target: No tienes suficientes fondos Ethereum para pagar la tarifa de la transacción (%(ethereumRequired)s ETH).

trans-unit.id: Please enter an address other than your wallet address
trans-unit.source: Please enter an address other than your wallet address
trans-unit.target: Introduce una dirección diferente de la dirección de tu monedero

trans-unit.id: Please enter a private key other than your wallet private key
trans-unit.source: Please enter a private key other than your wallet private key
trans-unit.target: Introduce una clave privada diferente de la clave de tu monedero

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee and minimum reserve into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is. We have amended the value in the amount field for you
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Taking transaction fee and minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) into account, we estimated that the max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
trans-unit.target: Parece que estás intentando desocupar tu monedero. Tomando en cuenta la tarifa por la transacción y la reserva mínima de (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s), calculamos que el importe máximo que puedes enviar es %(sendableBalance)s. Hemos corregido por ti el valor en el campo del importe.

trans-unit.id: Your wallet isn't activated. To activate it please send greater than minimum reserve (:minReserve :denomination) to your wallet address.
trans-unit.source: Your wallet isn't activated. To activate it please send greater than minimum reserve (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) to your wallet address.
trans-unit.target: Tu monedero no está activado. Para activarlo, envía un importe de (%(minReserve)s %(denomination)s) mayor a la reserva mínima a tu dirección de monedero.

trans-unit.id: Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You can send only amount greater than :minReserve :denomination.
trans-unit.source: Recipient's wallet isn't activated. You can send only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.
trans-unit.target: El monedero del destinatario no está activado. Solo puedes enviar un importe mayor a %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.

trans-unit.id: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
trans-unit.source: An arbitrary unsigned 32-bit integer that identifies a reason for payment or a non-Ripple account.
trans-unit.target: Es un entero aleatorio sin signo de 32 bits que identifica el motivo del pago o una cuenta no Ripple.

trans-unit.id: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
trans-unit.source: A 256-bit hash that can be used to identify a particular payment.
trans-unit.target: Un hash de 256 bits que puede ser usado para identificar un pago en particular.

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid invoice ID
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid invoice ID
trans-unit.target: Introduce un id. de factura correcto

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid destination tag
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid destination tag
trans-unit.target: Introduce una etiqueta de destino correcta

trans-unit.id: Exchange is currently unavailable for this pair
trans-unit.source: Exchange is currently unavailable for this pair
trans-unit.target: Actualmente no hay cambio para este par
Cuenta creada %(destination)s con un saldo de %(amount)s XLM

trans-unit.id: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
trans-unit.source: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 28-bytes long.
trans-unit.target: Este memo contiene información adicional opcional. Un cadena hasta de 28 bytes.

trans-unit.id: Your wallet isn't activated. You can receive only amount greater than :minReserve :denomination.
trans-unit.source: Your wallet isn't activated. You can receive only amount greater than %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.
trans-unit.target: Tu monedero no está activado. Solo puedes recibir un importe mayor a %(minReserve)s %(denomination)s.

trans-unit.id: Your ShapeShift account is not verified.
trans-unit.source: Your ShapeShift account is not verified.
trans-unit.target: Tu cuenta de ShapeShift no está verificada.

trans-unit.id: The EOS account name must be exactly 12-character long and consist of lower case letters and digits from 1 to 5.
trans-unit.source: The EOS account name must be exactly 12-character long and consist of lower case letters and digits from 1 to 5.
trans-unit.target: El nombre de la cuenta EOS debe tener exactamente 12 caracteres y estar compuesto por letras en mayúsculas y los dígitos del 1 al 5.

trans-unit.id: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
trans-unit.source: This account name is already taken, please choose another one.
trans-unit.target: Este nombre de cuenta ya está en uso. Elige otro.

trans-unit.id: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than :minAmount) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
trans-unit.source: To create a new account you need to make an EOS transfer (amount greater than %(minAmount)s) with the following data from an exchange or other EOS wallet.
trans-unit.target: Para crear una cuenta nueva debes hacer una transferencia EOS (importe mayor de %(minAmount)s) con los siguientes datos de una bolsa u otro monedero EOS.

trans-unit.id: Account has been successfully set up
trans-unit.source: Account has been successfully set up
trans-unit.target: La cuenta se ha configurado correctamente

trans-unit.id: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
trans-unit.source: The memo contains optional extra information. A string up to 256-bytes long.
trans-unit.target: Este memo contiene información adicional opcional. Un cadena hasta de 256 bytes.

trans-unit.id: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Max amount you can send is. We have amended the value in the amount field for you
trans-unit.source: It seems like you are trying to empty your wallet. Max amount you can send is %(sendableBalance)s. We have amended the value in the amount field for you.
trans-unit.target: Parece que estás intentando desocupar tu monedero. El importe máximo que puedes enviar es %(sendableBalance)s. Hemos corregido por ti el valor en el campo del importe.

trans-unit.id: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Transaction has been expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: La transacción ha caducado. Intenta de nuevo.

trans-unit.id: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
trans-unit.source: Account CPU usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more CPU.
trans-unit.target: El uso de CPU de la cuenta ha sido excedido. Intenta de nuevo o pide a alguien que te asigne más CPU.

trans-unit.id: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
trans-unit.source: Account NET usage has been exceeded. Please try again later or ask someone to stake you more NET.
trans-unit.target: El uso de NET de la cuenta ha sido excedido. Intenta de nuevo o pide a alguien que te asigne más NET.

trans-unit.id: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
trans-unit.source: The extra amount will be deposited to the created account.
trans-unit.target: El importe adicional será depositado en la cuenta creada.

trans-unit.id: Can't connect to :network node. Please try again later or choose another token.
trans-unit.source: Can't connect to %(network)s node. Please try again later or choose another token.
trans-unit.target: No se puede conectar con el nodo %(network)s. Intenta de nuevo más tarde o elige otro token.

trans-unit.id: Network node error. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: %(network)s node error. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Error del nodo %(network)s. Intenta de nuevo más tarde.

trans-unit.id: Send :depositAmount :depositSymbol to deposit address. It will be converted into :toSymbol, and sent to :toAddress
trans-unit.source: Send %(depositAmount)s %(depositSymbol)s to deposit address. It will be converted into %(toSymbol)s, and sent to %(toAddress)s
trans-unit.target: Enviar %(depositAmount)s %(depositSymbol)s a la dirección para depositar. Esto se convertirá en %(toSymbol)s y se enviará a %(toAddress)s

trans-unit.id: You have 36 hours to send funds otherwise the transaction will be cancelled automatically.
trans-unit.source: You have 36 hours to send funds otherwise the transaction will be cancelled automatically.
trans-unit.target: Tienes 36 horas para enviar los fondos, de lo contrario, la transacción será cancelada automáticamente.

trans-unit.id: Property for addresses of currencies that use additional ID for transaction processing (e.g., destination tag, memo or message).
trans-unit.source: Property for addresses of currencies that use additional ID for transaction processing (e.g., destination tag, memo or message).
trans-unit.target: Propiedad para las direcciones de las divisas que usan un id. adicional para el procesamiento de transacciones (por ejemplo, etiqueta de destino, memo o mensaje).

trans-unit.id: Network fee is fixed and taken each time wherever money is sent. Each currency has a strict amount taken for operations. This fee is taken once your funds are included in a blockchain.
trans-unit.source: Network fee is fixed and taken each time wherever money is sent. Each currency has a strict amount taken for operations. This fee is taken once your funds are included in a blockchain.
trans-unit.target: La tarifa de la red es fija y se cobra cada vez que se envía dinero. Cada divisa cobra un importe estricto por las operaciones. Esta tarifa se cobra una vez que los fondos se incluyen en una cadena de bloques.

trans-unit.id:
Currently, your transaction (ID: :id) is on hold.
Please, contact Changelly to pass KYC.
trans-unit.source:
Currently, your transaction (ID: %(id)s) is on hold.
Please, contact Changelly to pass KYC.
trans-unit.target:
Actualmente, tu transacción (Id.: %(id)s) está en espera.
Comunícate con Changelly para aprobar el KYC.

trans-unit.id: Transaction (ID: :id) has failed. Please, contact Changelly.
trans-unit.source: Transaction (ID: %(id)s) has failed. Please, contact Changelly.
trans-unit.target: La transacción (Id.: %(id)s) ha fallado. Comunícate con Changelly.

trans-unit.id: Exchange failed and coins were refunded to :address.
trans-unit.source: Exchange failed and coins were refunded to %(address)s.
trans-unit.target: La negociación falló y las monedas fueron reembolsadas a %(address)s.

trans-unit.id: Payment wasn't received since 36 hours since the transaction was created.
trans-unit.source: Payment wasn't received since 36 hours since the transaction was created.
trans-unit.target: El pago no se recibió habiendo transcurrido 36 horas desde la creación de la transacción.

trans-unit.source:
I have read and I agree to the Changelly terms of use and privacy policy.
By clicking "Accept", I acknowledge and understand that my transaction may trigger AML/KYC verification according to Changelly AML/KYC.
trans-unit.target:
He leído y acepto los Términos de uso y la Política de privacidad de Changelly.
Al hacer clic en "Acepto", reconozco y comprendo que mi transacción puede activar una verificación AML/KYC de acuerdo con Changelly AML/KYC.

trans-unit.id: Amount of coins that is charged from your balance for single transaction (more info).
trans-unit.source: Amount of coins that is charged from your balance for single transaction (more info).
trans-unit.target: La cantidad de monedas que se cobra de tu saldo por una sola transacción (más información).

trans-unit.id: Almost done! Enter the following words from your passphrase.
trans-unit.source: Almost done! Enter the following words from your passphrase.
trans-unit.target: ¡Casi listo! Introduce las siguientes palabras de tu frase de contraseña.

trans-unit.id: Please enter a valid email address
trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid email address
trans-unit.target: Escribe una dirección de correo electrónico correcta
Hemos enviado el código de verificación a %(destination)s.

trans-unit.id: You can purchase up to :dailyLimitRemaining today, and up to :monthlyLimitRemaining this month.
trans-unit.source: You can purchase up to %(dailyLimitRemaining)s today, and up to %(monthlyLimitRemaining)s this month.
trans-unit.target: Puedes comprar una suscripción hasta por %(dailyLimitRemaining)s hoy, y hasta por %(monthlyLimitRemaining)s este mes.

trans-unit.id: To increase your limits you need to pass verification.
trans-unit.source: To increase your limits you need to pass verification.
trans-unit.target: Para aumentar el límite debes aprobar la verificación.

trans-unit.id: No verification methods are currently available.
trans-unit.source: No verification methods are currently available.
trans-unit.target: Actualmente no hay métodos de verificación disponibles.

trans-unit.id: Code is invalid or expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.source: Code is invalid or expired. Please try again.
trans-unit.target: El código es incorrecto o ha caducado. Intenta de nuevo.

trans-unit.id: Upload failed. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: Upload failed. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: No se pudo cargar. Intenta de nuevo más tarde.

trans-unit.id: Use billing address the same that I have.
trans-unit.source: Use billing address the same that I have.
trans-unit.target: Usar la misma dirección que tengo como dirección de facturación.

trans-unit.id: Identity verification must be passed before saving card
trans-unit.source: Identity verification must be passed before saving card
trans-unit.target: Debes aprobar la verificación de identidad antes de guardar la tarjeta

trans-unit.id: If the rate changes by more than +/- 2.5%% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email.
trans-unit.source: If the rate changes by more than +/- 2.5%% you will be asked to reconfirm the transaction via email.
trans-unit.target: Si la tarifa cambia en más de +/- 2.5%%, se te pedirá que reconfirmes la transacción por correo electrónico.

trans-unit.id: Make sure that your card is valid and has sufficient available balance.
trans-unit.source: Make sure that your card is valid and has sufficient available balance.
trans-unit.target: Asegúrate que tu tarjeta es válida y que tiene suficiente saldo disponible.

trans-unit.id: You have exceeded your daily limit. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: You have exceeded your daily limit. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Has excedido tu límite diario. Intenta de nuevo más tarde.

trans-unit.id: You have exceeded your monthly limit. Please try again later.
trans-unit.source: You have exceeded your monthly limit. Please try again later.
trans-unit.target: Has excedido tu límite mensual. Intenta de nuevo más tarde.
